name: [In-Dev] Blacksmith
description:
# The game is currently under development. Look forward to your feedback and suggestions :).

Blacksmith is a meta-game in which tha player, as the blacksmith, helps the Hero and fight against the Supvervillain by assigning monstrs equipment and chests. The game is potentially developed to  an asymmetric 3-player game.

Control: Drag a card onto a monster or a chest. Remember, weapons, armours and even chests can be enchanted by runes with powerful effects. 

Notes: The build is expected  to be polished and completed. The economic/consumptionsystem is under testing and isn't shown in this build. The Blacksmith has to consume materials and mana to produce equipment and chests.

Ongoing additions and changes:

- Economic/consumption systems including expensive chests and paid card removal from  hand;

- Equipment durability and data balancing;

- Improved feedback of UI (resource points and chests), skills (more effects and caster-and-receiver feedback) and monster animations (attack and death);

- Menus and  tutorials;
